org.semanticweb.kaon2.extensionapi.formats
Interface OntologyFormatHandler

public interface OntologyFormatHandler

A handler for an ontology format.

Nested Class Summary
static interface OntologyFormatHandler.OperationInterrupt
          This interface is passed to the handler to signal an interrupt.

exportOntology

void exportOntology(OntologyFormatHandler.OperationInterrupt operationInterrupt,
                    java.io.Writer writer,
                    java.lang.String encoding,
                    java.lang.String ontologyURI,
                    Term module,
                    java.util.Set<Annotation> annotations,
                    java.util.Set<java.lang.String> importedOntologyURIs,
                    OntologyContents ontologyContents)
                    throws KAON2Exception,
                           java.io.IOException,
                           java.lang.InterruptedException
Writes an ontology onto the given writer.

Parameters:
operationInterrupt - shows whether an operation should be interrupt
writer - the writer that receives the ontology
encoding - the encoding
ontologyURI - the URI of the ontology
module - the module of the ontology
annotations - the annotations of an ontology
importedOntologyURIs - the URIs of the imported ontology
ontologyContents - the object containing the ontology information
Throws:
KAON2Exception - thrown if there is an error
java.io.IOException - thrown if there is an error
java.lang.InterruptedException - thrown if the process was interrupted

parseOntology

void parseOntology(OntologyFormatHandler.OperationInterrupt operationInterrupt,
                   java.io.Reader reader,
                   java.lang.String physicalURI,
                   OntologyResolver ontologyResolver,
                   ImportListener importListener,
                   ProgressListener progressListener)
                   throws InvalidFormatException,
                          KAON2Exception,
                          java.io.IOException,
                          java.lang.InterruptedException
Attempts to parse an ontology from the given source.

Parameters:
operationInterrupt - shows whether an operation should be interrupt
reader - the reader
physicalURI - the physical URI
ontologyResolver - the resolver for ontologies
importListener - the interface that receives information about the ontology as it is being parsed
progressListener - the listener about the progress of the open operation
Throws:
InvalidFormatException - thrown if the format of the source does not match with this format
KAON2Exception - thrown if there is an error
java.io.IOException - thrown if there is an error
java.lang.InterruptedException - thrown if the process was interrupted

parseOntology

void parseOntology(OntologyFormatHandler.OperationInterrupt operationInterrupt,
                   java.io.InputStream inputStream,
                   java.lang.String physicalURI,
                   OntologyResolver ontologyResolver,
                   ImportListener importListener,
                   ProgressListener progressListener)
                   throws InvalidFormatException,
                          KAON2Exception,
                          java.io.IOException,
                          java.lang.InterruptedException
Attempts to parse an ontology from the given source.

Parameters:
operationInterrupt - shows whether an operation should be interrupt
inputStream - the input stream
physicalURI - the physical URI
ontologyResolver - the resolver for ontologies
importListener - the interface that receives information about the ontology as it is being parsed
progressListener - the listener about the progress of the open operation
Throws:
InvalidFormatException - thrown if the format of the source does not match with this format
KAON2Exception - thrown if there is an error
java.io.IOException - thrown if there is an error
java.lang.InterruptedException - thrown if the process was interrupted
